card.name: Fair Trade
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep you may exchange control of a non-land permanent you control with a non-land permanent a target opponent controls of the same mana value.

card.name: Harmless Cart
card.text:
Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This vehicle becomes an artifact creature until the end of turn.)
{4}{T}: Destroy all creatures except for the ones crewing Harmless Cart. Then sacrifice Harmless Cart.

card.name: False Hydra
card.text:
Shroud
When an attacking creature is blocked by False Hydra, untap the creature and remove it from combat. Prevent all combat damage dealt by that creature.
If a non-token creature would be put in the graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: The Red Crawl
card.text:
Enchant player
Each creature that player controls gets a -1/-1 counter on that players upkeep

card.name: William, Timeless Benefactor
card.text:
When William, Timeless Benefactor enters the battlefield, proliferate.
{U}{U}{U}: Exile target non-land permanent. Return this card to the battlefield on your next upkeep.

card.name: Bottle Battle
card.text: Choose an opponent. You both select a non-land permenant you own to bet in the game then each roll a d20. The player who rolls highest gains control of both permanents betted. If either roll is a 1 then that player also loses 5 life.

card.name: Robin, Ships Medic
card.text:
Partner with Hale, Ships Captain
All pirates have indestructible.

card.name: Gwen, Midnight Marked
card.text: Vigilance, Trample Enrage-Whenever Gwen, Midnight Marked is dealt damage you may play a spell of 3cmc or less from your hand for free.

card.name: Syr Verum
card.text:
Indestructible
If Syr Verum is put into the graveyard or exile from anywhere return it to the battlefield under its owners control.

card.name: Eliza, Broken Chain
card.text:
{T}: Deal damage equal to Eliza, Broken Chains power to target creature. Gain an experience counter
{1}{U}: As an additional cost remove any number of experience counters. Gain life equal to the experience counters removed
{1}{B}: As an additional cost remove any number of experience counters. Deal damage to target opponent equal to the amount of counters removed.

card.name: Hale, Ship Captain
card.text:
Partner with Robin, Ship Medic
Haste, Trample
Whenever another pirate enters the battlefield under your control add a crew counter to Hale, Ship Captain then draw a card for each crew counter she has.
